alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Harris; Heard; Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 5:31PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Meriwether, Heard, Troup, Coweta and northern Harris Counties through 600 PM EST... At 528 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Powers Crossroads to near West Point, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, LaGrange, Hamilton, Franklin, Greenville, Tyrone, West Point, Hogansville, Grantville, Pine Mountain, Luthersville, Centralhatchee, Moreland, Sharpsburg, Turin, Lone Oak, East Newnan, Corinth, F.d. Roosevelt State Park and Mountville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
